title: multiple layers of protection
extract: With this assumption in mind, each individual layer in a multi-layered security approach focuses on a specific area where the malware could attack. ... The types of security layers you can use in your network defense include: Web protection. Patch management.
extract_html: With this assumption in mind, each individual layer in a multi-layered security approach focuses on a specific area where the malware could attack. ... The types of security layers you can use in your network defense include: Web protection. Patch management.
